response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you and meet your needs. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it is worth $12,000 to you. However, I understand that sometimes finding the right moment to make a purchase can be challenging. To facilitate this process, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $11,000. This offer is exclusive to you and is valid for the next 48 hours. Please let me know if you wish to proceed with this offer, so we can arrange the details promptly.", "product_price": 11000}
